actions.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to extend to private property owners and managers in the City of Fredericksburg and the counties of Caroline, King George, Spotsylvania, and Stafford in Virginia the same preferences in negotiating for the leasing of space for the use of the Federal government that are given to private property owners and managers in jurisdictions in the National Capital region.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of General Services (GSA) to extend to private property owners and managers in the city of Fredericksburg and the counties of Caroline, King George, Spotsylvania, and Stafford in Virginia the same preferences in negotiating for the leasing of space for federal government use that are given to private property owners and managers in jurisdictions in the National Capital region.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of General Services to extend to private property owners and managers in the City of Fredericksburg and the counties of Caroline, King George, Spotsylvania, and Stafford in Virginia the same preferences in negotiating for the leasing of space for the use of the Federal government that are given to private property owners and managers in jurisdictions in the National Capital region.
